node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `debatecomment` ( `debatecomment_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `parent_debatecomment` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `root_debatecomment` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `doctext` text NOT NULL, `restricted` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`debatecomment_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 PACK_KEYS=1
node.title: debatecomment
